import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import usePlayers from "../../hooks/skrallgaming/usePlayers"; import Navbar from "../../components/navigation/skrallgaming/Navbar"; import { Checkbox } from "../../components" import "../../assets/style/skrallgaming/calculator.css" export default function Calculator(){ const { players } = usePlayers() const [ selectedPlayers , setSelectedPlayers ] = useState([undefined, undefined, undefined, undefined]) const [ winningPercentage , SetWinningPercentage ] = useState(undefined) const [ gamesWon , setGamesWon ] = useState([undefined, undefined, undefined]) const [ gameType , setGameType ] = useState("smash2") const FindPlayer = (id, playerName) => { const player = players.find(player => player.name === playerName) let newSelectedPlayers = selectedPlayers.slice() newSelectedPlayers[id] = player setSelectedPlayers(newSelectedPlayers) } const playerOptions = () => { //Denna körs för mkt, kör i en useEffect på ngt sätt istället.. return( <> { players && players.length > 0 && players.map(player => ( )) } ) } const calculateNewRating = () => { let lostGames = 0; let wonGames = 0; let players = [null, ...selectedPlayers] players.shift() console.log(players, selectedPlayers) for (let i = 0; i < gamesWon.length; i++){ console.log(i, players, selectedPlayers) if (lostGames > gamesWon.length / 2 || wonGames > gamesWon.length / 2) break wonGames += gamesWon[i] ? 1 : 0; lostGames += !gamesWon[i] ? 1 : 0; let team1, team2 if (gameType === "beerPong"){ team1 = players[0].beerPong + (players[1]?.beerPong || 0) team2 = players[2].beerPong + (players[3]?.beerPong || 0) } else{ team1 = players[0].rating + players[1].rating team2 = players[2].rating + players[3].rating } const dif = Math.round((-2*winningPercentage/10)+20)*(+gamesWon[i])-Math.round((-2*(100-winningPercentage)/10)+20)*(+!gamesWon[i]); for (let j = 0; j < players.length; j++){ if (gameType === "smash1" && j % 2) continue let p = players[j] let rating = (gameType === "beerPong" ? p.beerPong : p.rating) let opponentTeam = (j <= 1 ? team2 : team1) rating = Math.round(Math.pow(-(Math.pow(((1/(1+Math.pow(10,((opponentTeam/2 - rating)/400))))*100)-50,2)/(500/4))+20,3)); players[j].rating = rating } } console.log("finished:", players, selectedPlayers) } const getRating = (id) => { if (gameType === "beerPong") return selectedPlayers[id]?.beerPong ?? 1500 else return selectedPlayers[id]?.rating ?? 1500 } useEffect(() => { if (gameType !== "smash1" && selectedPlayers.includes(undefined)) return if (gameType === "smash1" && (selectedPlayers[0] === undefined || selectedPlayers[2] === undefined)) return if (gameType === "beerPong") SetWinningPercentage(parseInt((1 / (1 + Math.pow(10, ( (selectedPlayers[2]?.beerPong ?? 1500) + (selectedPlayers[3]?.beerPong ?? 1500) - ((selectedPlayers[0]?.beerPong ?? 1500) + (selectedPlayers[1]?.beerPong ?? 1500)) ) / 400)))*100)) else if (gameType === "smash1") SetWinningPercentage(parseInt((1 / (1 + Math.pow(10, ((selectedPlayers[2]?.rating ?? 1500) - (selectedPlayers[0]?.rating ?? 1500)) / 400)))*100)) else SetWinningPercentage(parseInt((1 / (1 + Math.pow(10, ( (selectedPlayers[2]?.rating ?? 1500) + (selectedPlayers[3]?.rating ?? 1500) - ((selectedPlayers[0]?.rating ?? 1500) + (selectedPlayers[1]?.rating ?? 1500)) ) / 400)))*100)) }, [selectedPlayers, gameType] ) return <>

Team 1

{gameType !== "smash1" && } {gameType !== "smash1" && }
{getRating(0)}
{getRating(1)}
Average Rating {(getRating(0) + getRating(1)) / 2}
Win Percentage {winningPercentage}%

Team 2

{gameType !== "smash1" && } {gameType !== "smash1" && }
{getRating(2)}
{getRating(3)}
Average Rating {(getRating(2) + getRating(3)) / 2}
Win Percentage {100 - winningPercentage}%
{ gamesWon.map((gameResult, i) => { let foo = [...gamesWon] foo.splice(i) const lostGames = foo.reduce((pre, cur) => pre + (!cur && 1) , 0) const wonGames = foo.reduce((pre, cur) => pre + (cur && 1) , 0) let hideNext = false; if (lostGames > gamesWon.length / 2 || wonGames > gamesWon.length / 2) hideNext = true return( ) }) }
{ let newArr = [...gamesWon] newArr[i] = !newArr[i] setGamesWon(newArr) }} />

Team 1

{gameType !== "smash1" && }
Rating: {getRating(0)} Rating: {getRating(1)}
Average Rating: {(getRating(0) + getRating(1)) / 2}
Win Percentage: {winningPercentage}%

Team 2

{gameType !== "smash1" && }
Rating: {getRating(2)} Rating: {getRating(3)}
Average Rating: {(getRating(2) + getRating(3)) / 2}
Win Percentage: {100 -winningPercentage}%
*/} {/*

*/}
}
